sentences.english: In China, some aero-engines start to use single crystal turbine blades in practice.
sentences.chinese: 在国内，某些发动机上亦开始使用单晶涡轮转子叶片。

sentences.english: The energy output from a monocrystalline cell varies with insolation level in an almost linear fashion across its operating range.
sentences.chinese: 单晶电池的能量输出随着光照水平基本呈线性变化。

sentences.english: In practice, different materials show considerable difference in the ability to form single crystals.
sentences.chinese: 由于不同材料形成单晶体的能力有很大差异。

sentences.english: Products in China of China Light Industry Products Quality Assurance Center in 2002. In recent yeas, it has developed monocrystalline silicon.
sentences.chinese: 开发了用于飞速发展的电子行业专用材料硅单晶。

sentences.english: The anisotropy of compression creep strength in a nickel-base single crystal superalloy was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了镍基单晶高温合金压缩蠕变强度的各向异性。

sentences.english: These benefit from the SOI Monocrystal silicon structure it possesses.
sentences.chinese: 这主要得益于它采用了单晶硅膜的SOI结构。

sentences.english: Compared with crystal silicon, porous silicon has a stronger optical absorption and blue shift has taken place at its absorption edge.
sentences.chinese: 同单晶硅相比，其吸收边发生了蓝移，并且吸收强烈。

sentences.english: Silicon-based MMICs for millimeter-wave applications were also developed.
sentences.chinese: 我们同时亦发展毫米波矽基单晶积体电路。

sentences.english: The influence of the compound heat shield to the pull speed and the oxygen concentration is researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究了复合式热屏影响拉速和单晶氧含量的机理。

sentences.english: The goal can be the synthesis of either nanocrystals or large single crystals.
sentences.chinese: 目标可以是合成纳米结晶或大量的单晶。

sentences.english: The results showed that TCP phase has not appeared in DD2 single crystal alloy after ageing.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，DD2单晶合金时效后无任何有害相产生。

sentences.english: AlN crystals were grown by modified sandwich sublimation method in nitrogen atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 采用改进的升华法在氮气环境下制备氮化铝单晶体。

sentences.english: On this basis, the MD model of nanometric cutting is explored.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上，建立了单晶铜纳米切削分子动力学模型。

sentences.english: The apparatus is heat field apparatus for growing Ga doped silicon monocrystal.
sentences.chinese: 该装置是专门用于生长掺镓硅单晶热场装置。

sentences.english: We made the Czochralski silicon single crystal with a diameter of 12 inches.
sentences.chinese: 直径12英寸直拉单晶硅研制成功。

sentences.english: The bulk of the silicon crystal , in fact, is simply a mechanical support for the active portion.
sentences.chinese: 大多数硅单晶事实上是流动部门白勺机械支撑。
